  • key options
    • For CFLAGS
      • -l, -L 
        gcc -l links with a library file.
gcc -L looks in directory for library files.
      • -O
      • -fPIC
      • `-D
    • For LDFLAGS
      • -lxxx
      • -Ldir
      • -WL, option
      • -static
      • -s
    • LIBS
